SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
App
Initialize the Application
ApplicationException
The ApplicationException is a custom exception class that wraps all checked standard Java exceptions and can be used to handle risk-game-specific errors in Java.
Constants
 
Continent
 
Country
 
GameEngine
The GameEngine class is responsible for managing the game map, players, and their interactions in a game.
GameMap
 
MapDisplay
The MapDisplay class contains methods to populate and format a table displaying information about countries, continents, players, and neighboring countries on a game map.
MapEditor
This class operates on the current Game map.
MapReader
 
MapValidator
The MapValidator class provides methods to validate a game map by checking for various conditions such as empty map, non-existent continents or neighbors, self-referencing neighbors, inaccessible countries, and disconnected continents.
Order
This class is used to create order objects d_player: the player who issues the order d_orderType: the type of the order d_countryId: the country id that the order is issued to d_num: the number of armies that the order is issued to
Player
The Player class represents a player in this game, with properties such as name, countries owned, orders, and leftover armies, as well as methods to manipulate these properties.
Reinforcements
This class is to reinforce armies for each player.
